issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Fixes date32 support for date/time functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8360](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8360). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Gandiva date/time functions like extractYear[1] only work with millisecond, passing date32 to these functions will get wrong results.


[1]https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/6d92694d00aec08081ae1bfe06f0a265e141b1b7/cpp/src/gandiva/precompiled/time.cc#L75-L80
